predicate.note: Frames file for 'order' based on annotation-on-the-fly on the financial subcorpus and comparison with 'force' and 'tell.' No verbnet entry.

example.name: passivized
example.text: [Commonwealth Edison]-1 was ordered *trace-1* *trace-2* to refund about $250 million to its current and former ratepayers.
example.arg: *trace-2* to refund about $250 million to its current and former ratepayers

example.name: valentines day
example.text: Ever the romantic, John ordered a dozen dandelions for Mary from Bubba's Flower shop.
